title: How can I add app such as Keep Notes to the "Open File" options?
content:
I have .txt files that I would like to have on my phone for quick checking.  On my old iPhone I could look at those files in Notepad.  On the Pixel 4a those files were mostly transferred to Keep Notes.  (Some did not transfer, for mysterious reasons, but that's a separate issue.)  Pixel gives the options of opening with
     - DOCS (and immediately saves the file to Google Docs)  which I do not want to do
    - HTML viewer which for some reason randomly does not appreciate carriage returns so is not satisfactory
   - CHROME which I do not use and do not want to start using.

I know my preference may be unusual, but is the lack of flexibility here intentional by Google?  Or is there a work around?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
